name: Incrediball
description:
Incrediball is the most incredible endless rolling ball experience. Steer the ball left and right on randomly generated paths to show your friends that you are truly incrediball

Controls:
Click on the left or right side of the screen to steer the ball

Features:
* Unlock flashy new skins for your ball as you collect coconuts.
* Randomly Generated paths each attempt.
* Beautiful 3D graphics crafted with the Unity Engine
* Locally saved best scores and skins.
* Steer using touch controls (iOS).
* Compete with your friends to get the highest score!
* More coming soon!

Please leave a comment and let me know what you think! This was my first unity project/game so any criticism is welcome.

Follow me on Twitter @VScavetta24
